sentences.sentence: He checked his watch for the umpteenth time.
I explained for the umpteenth time why I didn't support the bill.
sentences.translation: 我第无数次向他解释我不支持这项法案的原因。

sentences.sentence: Not so many remember the umpteenth collapse of the American economy a few months before.
sentences.translation: 没有多少人记得几个月前美国一连串的经济崩溃。
